isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - POWER STEERING PUMP: VICKERS (LUK) V10NF AND V20NF - Special Tools

sstools.para: POWER STEERING ANALYZER - The ZTSE2780 is designed for measuring power steering pump flow rate and pump pressure.

Supplied with two quick couplings on analyzer's hoses for connecting to hydraulic system.. To install disconnect high pressure line at either power steering pump or steering gear and connect analyzer into the high pressure line.
BELT TENSION GAUGE - This gauge is designed and calibrated to accommodate all 3/8 inch through 3/4 inch width main drive and accessory drive belts.
